title: Forecast Janna joke now has a new problem...
body: So Forecast Janna's /joke problem was fixed in that it no longer plays the joke for the skin as well as the default skin joke at the same time. However, now there is another problem. The voice line stops as soon as you move your champ. This is not the same for the taunt and is not what it used to be. I have no idea why the skin's joke was being touched in the first place, but yeah hopefully it can be fixed soon.
